body: Isn't this broken in Go 1.4.* too? I'm having some weird behaviors on Windows (and there's some initial suspicion they might be return-related), when trying to work with WinAPI (e.g. apparently in WinAPI -> callback -> WinAPI -> callback chains). Not sure if they're the same case, but I've just tried tip, and they seem to disappear magically (i.e. works ok).
